insert into outbound_product( outbound_oder_code, sku_code, sku_name, picture_url, norms, color_name, color_code, model, unit_code, unit_name, outbound_norms, outbound_base_unit, outbound_base_content, pre_outbound_num, pre_outbound_main_num, pre_tax_purchase_amount, pre_tax_amount, pra_outbound_num, pra_outbound_main_num, pra_tax_purchase_amount, pra_tax_amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,linenum,tax) values

mapper.select:
select
from outbound_product a left join outbound b on b.outbound_oder_code = a.outbound_oder_code left join reject_record_detail c on a.sku_code = c.sku_code and b.source_oder_code = c.reject_record_code where a.outbound_oder_code = #{outboundOderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update outbound_product
pra_outbound_num = #{item.praOutboundNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pra_outbound_main_num = #{item.praOutboundMainNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pra_tax_purchase_amount = #{item.praTaxPurchaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pra_tax_amount = #{item.praTaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_by = #{item.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where outbound_oder_code = #{item.outboundOderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and linenum = #{item.lineCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}
